title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with 13 braking events.
caption: A red car drives through an intersection in a city street.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly through the intersection because there are several other cars and pedestrians around. It is changing lanes to get to its desired destination.
